front:
[专] Study: Risk factors for postoperative delirium in orthopedic surgery patients: a systematic review and meta-analysis.

What was the main finding?
back:
This study aimed to systematically review and meta-analyze the risk factors associated with postoperative delirium in orthopedic surgery patients.

 Niu Yanan, Wang Qiang, Lu Jin et al. (2025)
 https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40720202/

front:
[爪] Study: Potential targets of microglia in the treatment of neurodegenerative diseases: Mechanism and therapeutic implications.

What was the main finding?
back:
Microglial over-activation is closely associated with the secretion of pro-inflammatory cytokines, the phagocytosis of injured neurons, and the modulation of neurotoxic environments

 Zhao Wenhui, Liu Zhongxuan, Wu Jiannan et al. (2026)
 https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40145977/

front:
[-驻专住拽] Study: Multimorbidity, frailty and polypharmacy in European and Asian patients with atrial fibrillation: a comparison of two regional prospective observational registries.

What was the main finding?
back:
Multimorbidity, frailty, and polypharmacy are associated with worse outcomes in patients with atrial fibrillation (AF), leading to 'clinically complex' patient phenotypes

 Mei Davide Antonio, Proietti Marco, Romiti Giulio Francesco et al. (2025)
 https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/41345290/

front: [-驻专住拽] Based on Mei Davide Antonio et al. (2025), what clinical practice change might be considered?
back:
Finding: After adjustments, being frail was associated with lower OAC prescription, with Asians less likely prescribed than Europeans (OR 0.34, 95% CI 0.25-0.45 vs

Clinical relevance: Consider this evidence when treating elderly patients with deprescribing-related conditions.

 Full study: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/41345290/

front:
[-驻专住拽] Study: Risk factors influencing fall risk in geriatric patients with type 2 diabetes: a comprehensive analysis.

What was the main finding?
back:
Comorbidities, especially neuropathy and retinopathy, significantly increase fall risk in this group

 Bayrak Muharrem, Kaali Kamber, G眉ner Merve et al. (2025)
 https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40022664/

front:
[住专拽驻] Study: International society of sports nutrition position stand: 尾-hydroxy-尾-methylbutyrate (HMB).

What was the main finding?
back:
The available safety/toxicity data suggest that chronic HMB-Ca and HMB-FA consumption are safe for oral HMB supplementation in humans up to at least one year

 Rathmacher John A, Pitchford Lisa M, Stout Jeffrey R et al. (2025)
 https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/39699070/

front:
[ 砖 住专] Study: The impact of ageing on the structural compositions of the mucosa of human colon.

What was the main finding?
back:
In aged laboratory animals, increased mucosal permeability has been associated with overall loss of mucosal integrity, but equivalent studies have not been conducted for the human colon

 Baidoo Nicholas, Rasis Enrica De, Tahiri Dion et al. (2025)
 https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40848414/
